## ProgramBuilder.arrayLength() method

Same as the arrayLength builtin function in WGSL, only valid for WebGPU device

**Signature:**

```typescript
arrayLength(x: PBShaderExp): PBShaderExp;
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) |  |
